summary: When Bill and Connie Fuller are forced to move out of their Manhattan apartment because of their pet dog, Connie persuades Bill to buy a dilapidated old Pennsylvania house that George Washington allegedly slept in.
cast: Jack Benny|Ann Sheridan|Charles Coburn|Percy Kilbride|Hattie McDaniel|William Tracy|Joyce Reynolds|Lee Patrick|Charles Dingle|John Emery|Douglas Croft|Harvey Stephens|Franklin Pangborn|Gertrude Carr|Glen Cavender|Chester Clute|Dudley Dickerson|Sol Gorss|Stuart Holmes|Fred Kelsey|Kenner G. Kemp|Hank Mann|Jack Mower|Cliff Saum|Terry|Leo White|Marie Windsor|Isabel Withers
keywords: slapstick comedy|reference to h.v. kaltenborn|reference to mount vernon|pennsylvania|apartment
title: George Washington durmió aquí
